text: Gang-war se kitna achha nickname banta but jassa ne bakait bana diya tereko. . Bahut paisa bachega tera kyuki 1 peg me hi tereko chadh jati hai. Teri drunk dancing is the best I have ever seen. Kitna passion, kitni sexy adaye! Tera personal photographer bana tha mai Goa aur uske baad. Itna photogenic hai tu and you are so confident in front of the camera. Aur to aur pics post bhi kar leta hai tu (unlike us jo kabhi pics post nahi kar payenge). Ever thought of modelling as a career?. Goa ke pehle we were not so close. Time kaha hota tha tere paas. Bas assignments aur exam ke time ham yaad ate the tereko. Fir bolta hai ham tere sachhe dost nahi hai (you were drunk, remember hall 13 ground at 5 am?). IAS to tu majak majak me nikal lega. Aur ab to rr chhod de. You are so good bro, youâ€™d get everything you ever wanted. Stay awesome and keep in touch.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Will miss all the fun we had during placements. The late-night chats, the hopeless crying sessions, the "check if all questions are same", etc won't be forgotten for long. All hail "Saviour"!. I will remember for life how I didn't study a single Topology lecture and still managed to pass. Hope we'll meet many times in the future. After all, Bangalore it is. Don't ever change. I hope to get a new job with you giving all my tests, XD
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Kutte! Kitna kuch khilaya hai maine tereko. Bhulna mat. Kitna energetic hai bc tu. Kabhi bhi dekh lo, ful on enthu. Sports ke bare me nahi bolunga. Sab bol diye honge. Nisheeka ko bata de mai hi tha chat karne wala. Kitne logo se chat karwaye bc tune. Gharwalo ko bolkar shadi fix kara le. Mai ayega. AOT maine tereko dikhaya tha, uska thanks bol. Itna movies mat dekha kar bc, thoda chill bhi mar le. And one of the trait of yours- being melodramatic. Kuch bhi hoga, gussa kar ke baith jayega. Mahine-mahine to baat bhi nahi karta tha. But deep down, everyone knew it ki kuch time baad fir se khud baat karne ayega as if nothing had happened. I still donâ€™t understand ki tu itna magne kabse lag gaya? First year me apan saath me baithke chill karte the aur fir exam me hag dete the. Gurgaon me chill marna. Paisa hi paisa hoga. You are such an ambitious person. But remember, you earn money to spend it. Live life and fulfill your dreams. Nahi to paisa kama lega but jindagi piche reh jayegi. Milte rehna, tu to milega hi. Aa jayega merese treat lene. Whenever you read this, just remember Iâ€™ll be there for you.
Btw hagga is paar is the best!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: You were the first guy I met at IITK. Initial impressions? Bahut bolta hai bc. But never even once I thought ki chup ho ja. Itni meethi meethi baate bolta hai tu ki sunte hi jaate hai sab. I even thought ki you may be a manipulator (kya karu? Duniya bahut buri hai. Dimag me sab negative hi aata tha). But wtf? Itna achha aadmi nikla tu. And yo, how tf do you store so much info in that little (jk) brain of yours? Iâ€™ll never forget those nightouts between Lamba and us where we convinced him that you wonâ€™t find a girl here and just get yourself married. Ragging me bhi to saath me the apan. And how tf do you take a bathe so frickin quickly? Literally 2-3 minute me khatam. Bc tere karan mai bina brush kiye breakfast karne lag gaya. Lucknow was class and Rishikesh was fun. Wouldn't have been without you. Yaar tu jab hasta hai, pure wing ko pata chalta hai. Dikkat ye bhi nahi hai. Dikkat ye hai ki tu hasta hi rehta hai lol. Never stop laughing. Milte rahenge nahi bolunga coz milna is compulsory. Fuck pademic, milna is necessary. Abhi Gurgaon ja rha hai. Waha se seedha Delhi jayega (IAS ke liye) I know. Signing off Mr. Senator. Btw hagga is paar is the best!
author: Rushikesh  Najan
